Ninja AF101

Reliable air fryer with crisp results and dishwasher-safe basket.

View on Amazon

Specifications

  • Capacity: 4 qt
  • Power: 1550 W
  • Temperature range: 105–400°F
  • Basket type: Nonstick, round
  • Controls: Digital
  • Dishwasher safe parts: Yes
  • Dimensions: 8.5 x 12.1 x 11.0 in
  • Warranty: 1 year
  • Noise level: Moderate

FAQ

Does the Ninja AF101 cook evenly?

Yes, it delivers consistent crisping when food is placed in a single layer.
